snippet.title: The Last of Us Part II - Grounded Update Trailer | PS4
snippet.description:
https://www.playstation.com/games/the-last-of-us-part-ii/?emcid=or-1s-412983

Check out the new features coming to The Last of Us Part II with the all-new Grounded Update on August 13th – including the return of Grounded difficulty, a new Permadeath mode, new Trophies, and more. Learn more on http://www.naughtydog.com/blog/the_last_of_us_part_ii_grounded_update

The Last of Us Part II is available now for the PlayStation 4 system: https://store.playstation.com/?resolve=UP9000-CUSA07820_00-THELASTOFUS2STND

Rated Mature: Blood and Gore, Intense Violence, Nudity, Sexual Content, Strong Language, Use of Drugs
